presentationColumns.name: Revenue YTD
presentationColumns.description: YTD activities for a period range for the REVENUE financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue

presentationColumns.name: Cost of Revenue YTD
presentationColumns.description: YTD activities for a period range for the COGS, PURCH and RM CONS financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cost of Revenue

presentationColumns.name: Gross Profit YTD
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Revenue YTD - Cost of Revenue YTD.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Gross Profit YTD

presentationColumns.name: Gross Margin YTD %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (Gross Profit YTD / Revenue YTD) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Gross Margin YTD %

presentationColumns.name: Payroll Cost YTD
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Payroll Cost

presentationColumns.name: R&D Expense YTD
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : R&D Payroll Expenses YTD + Other R&D Expenses YTD.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.R&D Expense YTD

presentationColumns.name: Sales & Marketing Expense YTD
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Marketing Payroll Expense YTD + Other Marketing Expenses YTD + Sales Payroll Expenses YTD + Freight Expenses YTD + Other Sales Expenses YTD + Travel & Entertainment Expenses YTD.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Sales & Marketing Expense YTD

presentationColumns.name: Other Operating Expense YTD
presentationColumns.description: Other Operating Expenses metric is the YTD activities for a period range for sum of Financial Categories with these values: EMP BENFT, GEN PAYROLL, EMP SUPP, CONT EXP, EMP OVERTIME, VARIANCE EXP, MISC OPER EXP, and OTHER OPER EXP.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Operating Expense YTD

presentationColumns.name: Total Operating Expenses YTD
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Sales & Marketing Expense YTD + R&D Expense YTD + Other Operating Expense YTD.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Operating Expenses YTD

presentationColumns.name: Operating Profit YTD
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Revenue YTD - Cost of Revenue YTD - Total Operating Expenses YTD.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Operating Profit YTD

presentationColumns.name: Operating Margin YTD %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (Operating Profit YTD / Revenue YTD) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Operating Margin YTD %

presentationColumns.name: Other Income YTD
presentationColumns.description: Other Income metric is the YTD activities for a period range for the OTHER INC financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Income YTD

presentationColumns.name: EBITDA YTD
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Revenue YTD - Cost of Revenue YTD - Sales & Marketing Expenses YTD - Other Operating Expenses YTD - R&D Expenses YTD.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBITDA YTD

presentationColumns.name: EBITDA Margin YTD %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (EBITDA YTD / Revenue YTD) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBITDA Margin YTD %

presentationColumns.name: Depreciation Expenses YTD
presentationColumns.description: Depreciation Expenses metric is the YTD activities for a period range for the DEPCN financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Depreciation Expenses YTD

presentationColumns.name: EBIT YTD
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Revenue YTD - Cost of Revenue YTD- Sales & Marketing Expenses YTD - Other Operating Expenses YTD - R&D Expenses YTD - Depreciation Expenses YTD.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBIT YTD

presentationColumns.name: EBIT Margin YTD %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (EBIT YTD / Revenue YTD )* 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBIT Margin YTD %

presentationColumns.name: Interest Expense YTD
presentationColumns.description: Interest Expense metric is the YTD activities for a period range for the INT EXP financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Interest Expense YTD

presentationColumns.name: EBT YTD
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Revenue YTD - Cost of Revenue YTD - Sales & Marketing Expenses YTD - Other Operating Expenses YTD - R&D Expenses YTD - Interest Expense YTD - Depreciation Expenses YTD.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBT YTD

presentationColumns.name: EBT Margin YTD %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (EBT YTD / Revenue YTD) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBT Margin YTD %

presentationColumns.name: Income Tax Expense YTD
presentationColumns.description: Income Tax Expense metric is the YTD activities for a period range for the INC TAX financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Income Tax Expense YTD

presentationColumns.name: Net Income YTD
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Revenue YTD + Other Income YTD - Cost of Revenue YTD - Sales & Marketing Expenses YTD - Other Operating Expenses YTD - R&D Expenses YTD - Interest Expense YTD - Income Tax Expense YTD - Depreciation Expenses YTD
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Net Income YTD

presentationColumns.name: Net Income Margin YTD %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (Net Income YTD / Revenue YTD) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Net Income Margin YTD %
